document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecb894">inlets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cff5c">mind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cff5c">outlets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#107cff">Ascend </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff4614"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">eminence </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff4614">Immortality </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
